name: tanglemango
description: Get data from arbitrary websites based on link structure
author: Nathan Manceaux-Panot

scripts.build: rm -rf build/ && babel source --presets babel-preset-node6 -d build
scripts.build-browser-sandbox: npm run build && browserify build/sandbox.js -o build/browser-sandbox.js
scripts.build-browser-sandbox-and-confirm:
echo '
Building...' && npm run build-browser-sandbox && echo 'âœ” Browser test build ready.'
scripts.watch-browser-sandbox: npm run build-browser-sandbox-and-confirm; fswatch -o source/ | xargs -n1 -I{} npm run build-browser-sandbox-and-confirm
